title: STUCK IN AUTHENTICATING
body:
I need help guys, when I put my personal info and try to log in, I get stuck in " Authenticating " process.

Regards

replies.body: Your network might be having some troubles getting a good signal with our login servers if you're getting stuck on that authenticating step. Hit up our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some quick network troubleshooting steps, but let me know if none of that is working out!
